name: If you go down in the woods
name_original: If you go down in the woods
description:
18 April 2015, a sudden ,unexplained reversal of the earths polarity results in worldwide catastrophe as nature turns against the human race.The animals synaptic pathways have been altered due to the change in the magnetic field resulting in highly dangerous behavioural traits, early scientific research are inconclusive and it is unknown if this effect is permanent and/or will effect mankind.You play a man, alone, just trying to make his way home through The Forest of Dean unaware that a global event has occurred.-punch and shoot your way home-new approach to gaming-scenic backdrops of the Forest of Dean

'If you go down in the woods' is an experimental game, It will be released in a number of chapters.
